price: 86 Quant à ceux qui renient la foi et Nos signes, ils sont voués au brasier de l’Enfer.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū wakadhabū biāyātinā ulāika aṣḥābu al-jaḥīmi
